name: B.L.A.C.K. - 1
description:
You are drifting in space... Your Oxygen is running out... And suddenly bandits start to take interest in your tiny, experimental space Capsule.
Fight them off! Take what is theirs and survive until you reach your home, Earth.

During your journey you'll have to fight off bandits with the weapons you find or take from them. Pillage their spaceships for your own good: oxygen, ammo, and hope for a good weapon, if you are stuck with something of low quality, it might cost you your life.
Do not forget maintenance! Your capsule need some attention or it might end up suffocating you.
